text: Kenny "Dope" Gonzalez (born June 7, 1970), also sometimes known as K-Dope, is an American record producer and disc jockey. He is one half of the classic house music Masters at Work musical production team with Little Louie Vega; and also released the hit "The Bomb! (These Sounds Fall into My Mind)" as The Bucketheads. ==See also== *Ultra Naté *Master Blaster *Limahl *Ed Markey *Glória Maria *Marty Meehan *Lauren Vélez *Lzzy Hale *Emily King *La Bottega dell'Arte *Pierre Bachelet *Two Man Sound Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American producers Category:People from New York City
title: Kenny Dope
